Title: The Stakeout
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Michael Dante DiMartino, Bryan Konietzko (created by)
Actors: Janet Varney, David Faustino, Seychelle Gabriel, P.J. Byrne
Plot: While tracking Aiwei, Korra finds out more about Zaheer's motivations and purposes. Team Avatar is chased by both Zaheer's gang and the Earth Queen.
